meanings.definition: The state or quality of being puggy.
meanings.sent1: Her pugginesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The pugginesses of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The pugginesses of the teddy bear made it look extra cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The pugginesses of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The pugginesses of the marshmallows in the hot chocolate were irresistible.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a puggy appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cartoon character's pugginesses were endearing to the viewers.
meanings.sent2: The pugginesses of the bulldog made it a popular pet choice.
meanings.sent3: The pugginesses of the stuffed animal made it look huggable.
meanings.sent4: The pugginesses of the baby's cheeks were pinch-worthy.
meanings.sent5: The pugginesses of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
